body.name: Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner, 3 count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 14 mins
features: Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner helps eliminate odors and remove limescale buildup and grease to reveal a fresher, cleaner machine
Simply toss it in your empty dishwasher and run a cycle—just like Cascade ActionPacs
Use once a month to help keep your machine sparkling
For best results, use with Cascade Dishwasher Detergent and Cascade Power Dry Rinse Aid
body.description: Remove limescale buildup, grease, and odors from your dishwasher with Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner. Cycle after cycle, your dishwasher machine can develop unsightly deposits, buildup, and odors. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner helps eliminate odors and break through the buildup to reveal a fresher, cleaner dishwasher machine. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner comes in easy-to-use, single-dose pacs. Simply toss one in and run a cycle to keep your dishwasher machine clean and as fresh as it should be. For best results, use Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner once a month to keep your dishwasher machine sparkling. Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner is recommended by Cascade Detergent. For our ultimate clean, use Cascade Dishwasher Cleaner with Cascade Power Dry Rinse Aid for powerful drying and Cascade Platinum dishwasher detergent. Cascade Dishwasher Cascade is the #1 Recommended Brand in North America* *More dishwasher brands in North America recommend Cascade vs. any other automatic dishwashing detergent brand, recommendations as part of co-marketing agreements

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad I got these! Did a super good job on cleaning our dishwasher. I watched a video on youtube on removing the filter. It was really easy. After cleaning the filter, I ran a cleaning cycle with one of these pods. Our dishwasher smells fresh & is sparkling clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow - this worked!
reviews.reviewText: I use a different brand that has a weekly cleaning strength but when subscribe and save time came around it was out of stock so I wanted to try a substitute because if I miss a week, you can tell. :( Now, I already use Cascade tablets so I was a little skeptical if this would do much -- but I was shocked! It's not that the inside of my machine looks dirty, but there is a wet dog smell in the glasses if I don't clean it often enough (and yes, I do clean the filter too.) But, this tablet really cleaned the machine! I haven't used the weekly tabs in 2 weeks and there is still no smell. (For me, an empty rinse agent compartment can also impact a smell, so I keep that filled too. Sharing in case anyone else is trying to get of the smell on glasses.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Sparkling Solution for Dishwasher Maintenance!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner, and it's safe to say that this product has become my go-to choice for keeping my dishwasher in tip-top condition. 🍽️✨The pack of three is a real value. It's like getting a trio of spa treatments for your dishwasher. With these cleaners, my dishwasher feels rejuvenated, and my dishes come out as if they've just been pampered in a five-star resort. 🏨🧼The ease of use is a true blessing. It's like having a magic wand for dishwasher maintenance. Just pop one in and let it work its sparkling magic. No scrubbing, no mess, just effortless cleaning. 🪄🔮The results are crystal clear, both literally and figuratively. After using Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner, my dishwasher sparkles like new, and the performance is noticeably improved. It's like a breath of fresh air for my kitchen. 🌬️🏡In conclusion, Cascade Platinum Dishwasher Cleaner is a must-have for anyone who wants their dishwasher to perform at its best. It's convenient, effective, and a real game-changer for dishwasher maintenance. If you're looking to extend the life of your dishwasher and enjoy spotlessly clean dishes, this cleaner is like a secret ingredient for success. Highly recommended! 🌟🍽️🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My dishwasher smells new or better!
reviews.reviewText: This is a super easy fix to a stinky dishwasher. It cleans out a lot of debris and leaves the machine smelling fresh and clean. I'm actually surprised at how well it worked and will use it monthly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these. I also use the tablets once a month to keep my dish washer from build up. Yes the tablets work. Makes the dish washer sparkle and order free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used it to clean out the dishwasher in the apartment we just moved into. Made the dishwasher smell good and look very clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this actually works
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how effective this was. I have a dishwasher without a removable filter, and after 5-7 years it was producing dishes with a filmy grit on them, just not adequately washed. I tried a home remedy with some vinegar and that helped somewhat; then I tried this product and it was great, my dishes are sparkling again. I was really surprised and please with how effective it was. Obviously easy to use and pretty cheap, less than $2 per treatment. I'll use it now every couple months to keep things right, picked up two more boxes to put in the pantry for the future.
